content: "http://www.washingtontimes.com/news/2009/may/05/homeland-pulled-back-extremism-dictionary/" We can all feel safe at night now that each and every one of us that believes in something is now clearly defined in the new "Terrorist Dictionary For Dummies" just bought paid for and released with your tax dollars. Link to the Lexicon: "http://video1.washingtontimes.com/video/lexicon.pdf" Take it read it, learn it, live it and most of all point your finger to your neighbor and find some way to tag him to the Federal Government as a terrorist. Anyone that may be left that is not tagged could very well fall into an extremist group of their own which will be published in future releases. Even us, regular posters here on Mil.com. We are after all, posting extremist, mods it may be a future duty of yours to report us. Carry on.
